Set of messages 1.Message:
Release Some Energy
•	Baba da bi da ba da baaa! Pause Power! 
•	What’s Pause Power I hear you say? It’s the ability to transform from a grumpy, angry person into a calm, clear one. 
•	When I’m feeling frustrated I plant my feet firmly on the ground and I breathe in and out three times as slowly as I can. Sometimes I imagine I’m smelling a flower and blowing out a candle. 
•	Da ta! Pause Power! My transformation from grumpy to calm is complete!
